attributes.action: place the same strict controls on foreign hgv drivers and their vehicles asBritish drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the amount of people killed by hgv's driven by foreign drivers, I believe all drivers of hgvs should be governed by the same strict rules as British drivers. The vehicles should also be covered by the same rules.  There should also be a toll levied for these vehicles using our roads.  How many more people will die on our roads as a result.  At least 40 people were killed last year as a result of accidents with hgv's driven by foreign drivers.  Something needs to be done.
